concept.title: Part IV: Short Descriptions
concept.shortdesc: This module describes the multiple purposes of short descriptions, and explores best practices for writing them.

section.title: Learning Objectives
section.p: Upon completing this module, you will be able to:

ul.li: Define a short description and explain the different purposes it serves in DITA.
Understand the importance of short descriptions for user experience and content discoverability.
Identify the structural guidelines for writing effective short descriptions across different topic types.
Apply best practices for writing concise, user-focused short descriptions.
